agenda.description: ** REVISION ** HOUSE OF REPRESENTATIVES NOTICE OF PUBLIC HEARING COMMITTEE: Insurance TIME & DATE: 8:00 AM, Tuesday, April 16, 2019 PLACE: E2.014 CHAIR: Rep. Eddie Lucio III SB 615 Buckingham | et al. Relating to the operations and functions of the Texas Windstorm Insurance Association and the sunset review date for and programs administered by the association; authorizing a fee. HB 670 King, Ken | et al. Relating to health benefit plan coverage for ovarian cancer testing and screening. HB 1511 Coleman Relating to required coverage for eating disorders under group health benefit plans. HB 1635 Miller | et al. Relating to health benefit plan coverage for early childhood intervention services. HB 1648 Lucio III | et al. Relating to arbitration provisions in certain insurance policies and contracts. HB 1903 Smithee Relating to disclosures required in connection with the issuance of certain health benefit plans. HB 2104 Frullo Relating to a limitation on life insurance proceeds for terroristic acts. HB 2114 Martinez Fischer Relating to health benefit plan coverage of preexisting conditions. HB 2374 Johnson, Julie Relating to claims settlement for automobile insurance. HB 2378 Raymond Relating to disclosure of a beneficiary to a funeral director under a life insurance policy. HB 2507 Lucio III Relating to the regulation of short-term limited-duration health insurance policies. HB 2658 Johnson, Julie Relating to health benefit coverage for hearing aids for children and adults. HB 2816 Lucio III Relating to compensation and leave for certain employees of the fraud unit of the Texas Department of Insurance. HB 3232 Johnson, Julie Relating to the authority of health benefit plan issuers to require utilization review for a health care service provided by network physicians or providers. HB 3308 Smithee Relating to nonprofit legal services corporations. HB 3338 Johnson, Julie Relating to identification cards issued by health maintenance organizations and preferred provider organizations. HB 3737 Lucio III Relating to the administration of the financial responsibility verification program. HB 3828 Sherman, Sr. Relating to the disclosure of health benefit plan network status of certain physicians and health care practitioners. HB 3984 Leach Relating to health benefit plan coverage for scalp cooling for cancer patients. HCR 90 Shaheen Urging Congress to allow health savings accounts to be used for direct primary care. HB 4534 Lucio III Relating to the funding structure of the Texas Windstorm Insurance Association. HB 3228 Muñoz, Jr. Relating to title insurance rates and other matters relating to regulating the business of title insurance. Notice of this meeting was announced from the house floor. Bills added after last posting: HB 3228 HB 4534 ** See Committee Coordinator for previous versions ** of the schedule, if applicable. NOTICE OF ASSISTANCE AT PUBLIC MEETINGS Persons with disabilities who plan to attend this meeting and who may need assistance, such as a sign language interpreter, are requested to contact Stacey Nicchio at (512) 463-0850, 72 hours prior to the meeting so that appropriate arrangements can be made.
